sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"亲戚，亲属"之意。
means: relative ： 普通用词，常可与relation换用，有时指一般的亲戚。
relation ： 一般指因血统或婚烟关系形成的亲戚。

sentence.Network_en: An employer can demand written certification that the relative is really ill.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇主可以要求出具书面证明，证实员工的亲人确实病了。

sentence.Network_en: Economic reform has brought relative wealth to peasant farmers.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济改革给农民带来了相对的财富。

sentence.Network_en: The person can transfer from wheelchair to seat with relative ease.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个人可以比较轻松地从轮椅上移到座位上。

lj.lj_ly: the figures suggest that girls are underachieving relative to boys.
lj.lj_ls: 统计数字表明女生的学习成绩不如男生。

lj.lj_ly: if you have any queries relative to payment, please contact us.
lj.lj_ls: 如果您有与付款有关的疑问，请与我们联系。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French relatif, -ive, from late Latin relativus 'having reference or relation' (see relate)

entry.def: Your relatives are the members of your family.

example.ex: Do relatives of yours still live in Siberia?...
example.tran: 你的亲属仍然住在西伯利亚吗？

example.ex: Get a relative to look after the children.
example.tran: 找一个亲戚来照看孩子。

entry.def: You use relative to say that something is true to a certain degree, especially when compared with other things of the same kind.

example.ex: The fighting resumed after a period of relative calm...
example.tran: 战斗在相对平静的一段时间之后再次打响。

example.ex: It is a cancer that can be cured with relative ease...
example.tran: 这是一种相对来说比较容易治疗的癌症。

entry.def: You use relative when you are comparing the quality or size of two things.

example.ex: They chatted about the relative merits of London and Paris as places to live...
example.tran: 他们聊起了伦敦和巴黎两座城市相比较都有哪些宜居的优点。

example.ex: I reflected on the relative importance of education in 50 countries.
example.tran: 我思考了50个国家相对而言对教育的重视程度。

entry.tran: 与…相比;与…有关;涉及;关于
entry.def: Relative to something means with reference to it or in comparison with it.

example.ex: Japanese interest rates rose relative to America's...
example.tran: 日本利率随美国利率上浮。

example.ex: House prices now look cheap relative to earnings...
example.tran: 相对收入而言房价现在看起来比较便宜。

entry.def: If you say that something is relative, you mean that it needs to be considered and judged in relation to other things.

example.ex: Fitness is relative; one must always ask 'Fit for what?'...
example.tran: “适合”是相对而言的;应该常常问一问“适合什么？”

entry.tran: 亲缘动物（或植物、语言、发明等)
entry.def: If one animal, plant, language, or invention is a relative of another, they have both developed from the same type of animal, plant, language, or invention.

example.ex: The pheasant is a close relative of the Guinea hen.
example.tran: 雉与珍珠鸡有很近的亲缘关系。

means.word_mean: 1. a person related by blood or marriage;

sentences.sentence: "police are searching for relatives of the deceased"
"he has distant relations back in New Jersey"

means.word_mean: 2. an animal or plant that bears a relationship to another (as related by common descent or by membership in the same genus)
2. properly related in size or degree or other measurable characteristics; usually followed by `to';

sentences.sentence: "punishment oughtt to be proportional to the crime"

auth_sentence.content: I have a relative who is suffering from such.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have a relative who is suffering from such.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have a relative who is suffering from such.

auth_sentence.content: Relative to the earth you would cease to age.
auth_sentence.res_content: Relative to the earth you would cease to age.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Relative to the earth you would cease to age.

auth_sentence.content: Then again, relative anonymity can be a plus.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then again, relative anonymity can be a plus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then again, relative anonymity can be a plus.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或物等"; 2. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: appreciate欣赏+ive……的→adj.感谢的,赞赏的
conjunct结合的,共同的+ive……的→adj.连接的
defect过失;缺点+ive……的→adj.有缺陷的
digest消化+ive……的→adj.消化的,有助消化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 教育的,教育性的,教育上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: educate教育,培养,训练+ive……的→educative教育的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
stems_affixes.word_buile: elect选举,推选+ive……的→adj.选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
imitate模仿+ive……的→imitative模仿的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指示的,预示的,可表示的
stems_affixes.word_buile: indicate指示+ive……的→adj.指示的,预示的,可表示的
introduce引入,介绍+ive……的→introductive序文的,介绍的
loco地方+mot动+ive……的→从一个地方动到另一个地方→adj.运动的,移动的,运载的
meditate想,考虑+ive……的→adj.沉思的,冥想的
recept接受+ive……的→adj.善于接受的
regenerate改过自新的+ive……的→regenerative再生的
relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive……的→relative相对的;相关的
subject主题+ive……的→adj.主观的,个人的
recuperate复原+ive……的→recuperative
capt抓+ive人或物等→抓住的人
defect过失;缺点+ive人或物等→n.有缺陷的人
fug逃+it走+ive人→n.逃犯,逃亡者
loco地方+mot动+ive物→从一个地方动到另一个地方→火车头
nat本土的+ive人或物等→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive人或物等→n.亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物

Sentence.sentence: Social workers and experts on aging offer caregivers and potential caregivers help when arranging for the care of an elderly relative.
Albert Einstein predicted this in 1905, when he introduced the concept of relative time as part of his Special Theory of Relativity
He cut back only after a full-scale family intervention (干预), in which relatives told him he'd gained weight.
They find close relatives more reliable.
Mary might as well send her dog to her relative.
Mary is going to get a little dog from one of her relatives.

sentences.en: He retired and lived in relative isolation.
sentences.cn: 他退休后, 生活比较孤寂。

sentences.en: Let's make a relative study of the two languages.
sentences.cn: 让我们将这两种语言作一下比较研究。
一切事物都是相比较而存在的。

sentences.en: My uncle is my nearest relative.

jushi.english: Let's make a relative study of the two languages.
jushi.chinese: 让我们将这两种语言作一下比较研究。

jushi.english: He retired and lived in relative isolation.
jushi.chinese: 他退休后,生活比较孤寂。
一切事物都是相比较而存在的。
